pullRequest.title: Support streaming `from` and `do` clauses for code actions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Support streaming from and do clauses for code actions

Fixes #21801
Fixes #22230
Remarks

Related PR #22305

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

nodes.bodyText: Any specific reason to disable these test cases?
